about_the_game:
Shovel & Swindle is a co-op game where you and a friend explore a graveyard and rob graves to earn money while avoiding the guards and uncovering many secrets. Make sure you balance exploring and gaining money to progress.

Inspired by Burke & Hare, you'll go into a graveyard with the sole intention of robbing graves either alone or with a friend... But be wary, there are bobbies patrolling the graveyards, it seems they've been alerted from recent graverobbers trying to make easy money. 

You only have 10 minutes to complete a single graverobbing night. As you understand more of the graveyard, purchase more upgrades, you'll be able to delve deeper into the graveyard. But don't slack on your graverobbing duties, otherwise you'll fail to pay your rent.


Work your way through the level by solving puzzles, purchasing upgrades for quicker runs, to find the grand prize hidden in plain sight. Only then will your graverobbing days be behind you.

Explore more locations! Find more secrets! Solve more puzzles!

Uncover the secrets hidden right before your eyes to obtain what you desire most.

short_description: Shovel & Swindle is a fun co-op game, where players will make a living by graverobbing as Scotland's infamous Burke and Hare! Explore multiple locations and uncover the graveyard's secrets by solving puzzles, and avoiding getting caught by patrolling bobbies!
